column1: This appeal is from the judgment, delivered by the learned Trial Judge of the High Court of
Colombo, dated 29.10.2009, by which, the accused-appellant, was convicted and sentenced
to 2 years of rigorous imprisonment, which was suspended for 5 years and fined Rs. 95,000/.
The  accused-appellant  was  indicted  in  the  High  Court  of  Colombo  on  following  counts  by
